title: Demonstration Kitchen with Community Table and Coffee Bar
posting_body: Please feel free to Call or TEXT us for any info or to schedule a tour!
Prices and Availability subject to change.
This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 569 Sq.
Custom Home Quality - Right Where You Want to Be.
It's not every day that you find apartment homes built like this.
With lofty nine-foot ceilings and oversized windows, you'll feel right at home.
Stand-up showers with built-in seating and gourmet kitchens with under-cabinet lighting elevate the experience.
No need for a gym membership when you have 24-hour access to your own fitness center and top-of-the-line equipment.
Swim when the rest of Denver can't with a heated pool and spa that take "resort-style" to the next level.
Capstone is adjacent to the Denver Tech Center and the Dry Creek Light Rail Station is just a 1/2 block away on a covered pedestrian sky bridge.

Dramatic 9-Foot Ceilings, Under-Cabinet Kitchen Lighting, Air Conditioning, Quartz Countertops, Oversized Energy-Efficient Windows, Energy-Efficient Windows, Mosaic Tile Backsplashes*, Stand-Up Glass Showers with Built-In Seat, Two-Inch Blinds, Programmable Thermostats, Gourmet Kitchens, Expansive Mountain Views*, Custom Track Lighting, Personal Balconies*, Custom Espresso Cabinetry with Deluxe Hardware, Upgraded Stainless-Steel Appliance Package, Wood-Style Flooring, Open-Concept Design, Ceiling Fans, Spacious Walk-In Closets with Custom Organizers, Front-Loading Washer and Dryer in Each Home

Underground Parking Garage, Wi-Fi in Clubroom and Pool Area, Community Barbecue Area, Onsite Recycling Program, Controlled-Access Community, Resort-Inspired Heated Pool and Spa, Outdoor Lounge with Fireplace and Cozy Seating, Demonstration Kitchen with Community Table and Coffee Bar, Media Center with Computer Stations, Bicycle Storage Available, Wired for Technology, 24-Hour Fitness Center with Top-of-the-Line Equipment, 1/4 Mile to I-25 Freeway, Green Friendly Community, Resident Lounge with 80-Inch Flat-Panel HD TV, Walking Distance to Dry Creek Light Rail Station, Convenient Elevator Locations, Additional Onsite Storage Available*
Pet-friendly community - call or text us for info!
